blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Cannons.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.
capitol.name: Capitol

castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.
castle.name: Castle

citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.
citadel.name: Citadel

cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.
cityHall.name: City Hall

shipyard.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.
shipyard.name: Shipyard

dwellingLvl1.description: The Waterfall allows you to recruite Nymphs.
dwellingLvl1.name: Waterfall

dwellingLvl2.description: The Shack allows you to recruite Crew Mates.
dwellingLvl2.name: Shack

dwellingLvl3.description: The Frigate allows you to recruite Pirates.
dwellingLvl3.name: Frigate

dwellingLvl4.description: The Nest allows you to recruite Stormbirds.
dwellingLvl4.name: Nest

dwellingLvl5.description: The Tower of the Seas allows you to recruite Sea Witches.
dwellingLvl5.name: Tower of the Seas

dwellingLvl6.description: The Nix Fort allows you to recruite Nix.
dwellingLvl6.name: Nix Fort

dwellingLvl7.description: The Whirlpool allows you to recruite Sea Serpents.
dwellingLvl7.name: Whirlpool

dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Upg. Waterfall allows you to recruite Oceanids.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Waterfall

dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Upg. Shack allows you to recruite Seamen.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Shack

dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Upg. Frigate allows you to recruite Corsairs.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Frigate

dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Upg. Nest allows you to recruite Ayssids.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Nest

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Upg. Tower of the Seas allows you to recruite Sorceresses.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Tower of the Seas

dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Upg. Nix Fort allows you to recruite Nix Warriors.
dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Nix Fort

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Upg. Whirlpool allows you to recruite Haspids.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Whirlpool

fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.
fort.name: Fort

grail.description: The presence of the Lodestar increases weekly creature generation by 50% and provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, also making any land native to the creatures of the Cove.
grail.name: Lodestar

horde1.description: The Pub increases Crew Mates production by 4 per week.
horde1.name: Pub

horde1Upgr.description: The Pub increases Seamen production by 4 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Pub

horde2.description: The Roost increases Stormbirds production by 3 per week.
horde2.name: Roost

horde2Upgr.description: The Roost increases Ayssids production by 3 per week.
horde2Upgr.name: Roost

mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4

marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).
marketplace.name: Marketplace

resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 sulfur each day.
resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo

ship.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.
ship.name: Shipyard

dwellingUp2Lvl3.description: The Gunpowder Warehouse allows you to recruite Sea Dogs.
dwellingUp2Lvl3.name: Gunpowder Warehouse

special3.description:
**NOT WORKING YET
The Thief's Guild reveals additional information about the foes in the tavern.
NOT WORKING YET***
special3.name: Thieves' Guild

special4.description:
**NOT WORKING YET
The Grotto allows you to sacrifice creatures or artifacts in exchange for experience.
NOT WORKING YET***
special4.name: Grotto

tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.
tavern.name: Tavern

townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.
townHall.name: Town Hall

villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.
villageHall.name: Village Hall
